comments:
Description: Create a flatfile datasource and dataset, when click on the ?Editing Dataset? dialog, NullPointerException throws out.

 

Steps to reproduce:

1.Create a flatfile datasource and dataset. Get the attached flatfile datasource file.

2.In ?Editing Dataset? dialog, click on the left content, NullPointerException throws out.

 

Error log:
